BayeScEnv
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which BayeScEnv installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using BayeScEnv, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load BayeScEnv/1.1-iccifort-2019.5.281
```
